thread.title: Shirley Riser
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Shirley Riser

author: Shirley Riser
title: Shirley Riser
text:
When I saw that this new furniture store was open in the Cedar Hill area I immediately went in. I was greeted by a very nice young man. He gave me pointers I told him I would be back on the 20th to make my purchase. On the 20th, there he was to greet me once again. I knew what I wanted he wrote me up and I was done.
Your tracking device, OMG! stellar system. I was able to work that day. With your tracking system I saw where the delivery guys were, so I left work and was home in time. They were on time & set up everything and the rest is history. I'm a happy camper and I love my purchase. I have already told others about your store. Great deals, sales people and delivery guys.
thank you Home Zone!! and welcome to Cedar Hill Texas.
